rushing_attempts.sentence: He was stifled on the ground though, with 22 carries for 67 yards, which came out to a poor 3 yards per carry.

rushing_yards.sentence: He was stifled on the ground though, with 22 carries for 67 yards, which came out to a poor 3 yards per carry.

receiving_receptions.sentence: Javorius Allen took over after Forsett went down and had plenty of work, with 27 touches for 115 yards.

player_team_score.sentence: Louis castoff Chris Givens for a 39-yard gain and then Kyle Juszczyk for a 34-yard gain, which set Javorius Allen up for a 3-yard touchdown run and a 20-10 lead.

opponent_score.sentence: DeAngelo Williams was easily the best offensive player for the Steelers, as he carried the ball 17 times for 100 yards and 2 touchdowns.

rushing_attempts.sentence: DeAngelo Williams was easily the best offensive player for the Steelers, as he carried the ball 17 times for 100 yards and 2 touchdowns.

rushing_touchdowns.sentence: After getting up 7-0 in the first, the Ravens held on to the lead after picking off Ben Roethlisberger and having Justin Tucker kick 2 field goals to put them up 13-3 at halftime.

receiving_targets.sentence: Javorius Allen, fullback Kyle Juszczyk and wide receiver Kamar Aiken all topped 5 receptions, but nobody on the Ravens passed 66 receiving yards.

receiving_receptions.sentence: Javorius Allen, fullback Kyle Juszczyk and wide receiver Kamar Aiken all topped 5 receptions, but nobody on the Ravens passed 66 receiving yards.

receiving_yards.sentence: Allen was the workhorse for the Baltimore offense, rushing 18 times for 79 yards and a touchdown, while also catching 5 passes for 35 yards.
